title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4055.5 - Owners Registry
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4055.5 - Owners Registry

State Regulations

No horse shall be allowed to enter or start unless such
horse's ownership has been duly registered in the Owners Registry of The Jockey

Club and such horse's certificate of foal registration, certificate of foreign
registration, or racing permit has been duly endorsed, or a Jockey Club
certificate of ownership has been attached thereto, in conformity with
subdivisions (c) through (g) of section
4024.1
of this

Subchapter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4055.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
